items.sentence: Tom began to look into the problem as soon as Mary brought it to his attention.
Tom broke his right leg and was taken to hospital a few weeks before Christmas.
Tom called Mary to tell her that he might need her help later in the afternoon.
One afternoon in late spring, Tom went out for a swim and was never seen again.
I\'m beginning to doubt whether Tom can really understand French all that well.
Which would you rather do, stay at home and watch TV or go out and see a movie?
Tom and Mary broke up, so they won\'t be going to the dance together on Friday.
I don\'t remember if Tom lent me the book or if I borrowed it from the library.
According to the police, Tom wasn\'t the only one who broke into Mary\'s house.
Tom didn\'t know Mary thought he should invite John and Alice to their wedding.
